languages.text:
The Officer gains +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship when they have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining. They also gain an additional +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship after using any Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on a target with less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for 1 round.
These two sets of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} stack with each other but do not stack with themselves (the Officer can only have up to +20 Willpower and +20 Fellowship granted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} at any given time).
languages.original_text:
Офицер получает +10 к Воле и +10 к Общительности, когда у него остается меньше 50% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. Также он получает +10 к Воле и +10 к Общительности на 1 раунд после применения любой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} своего архетипа к цели, у которой осталось меньше 50% здоровья.
Эти наборы {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусов{/g} суммируются друг с другом, но не сами с собой (одновременно от этого {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}таланта{/g} офицер может получить +20 к Воле и +20 к Общительности).

traits.locale_text: The Leader's abilities work as if the Leader's Willpower and Fellowship were 20 points higher if either the target or the Leader has less than 50% wounds remaining.

The Leader gains +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship when they have less than 50% of their maximum wounds remaining. They also gain an additional +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship after using any Leader ability on a target with less than 50% wounds for 1 round.
These two sets of bonuses stack with each other but do not stack with themselves (the Leader can only have up to +20 Willpower and +20 Fellowship granted by this talent at any given time).

The Officer gains +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship when they have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining. They also gain an additional +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship after using any Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on a target with less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for 1 round.
These two sets of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} stack with each other but do not stack with themselves (the Officer can only have up to +20 Willpower and +20 Fellowship granted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} at any given time).

The Officer gains +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship when they have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining. They also gain an additional +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship after using any Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on a target with less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for 1 round.
These two sets of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} stack with each other but do not stack with themselves (the Officer can only have up to +20 Willpower and +20 Fellowship granted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} at any given time).

languages.text:
当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}当前{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于50%时，获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}。此外，当军官对生命值低于50%的目标使用任何军官{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}之后，还会额外获得+10意志与+10社交，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
这两项{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}可以互相叠加，但不能多次叠加。也就是说，此项{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}最多只能为军官提供+20意志与+20社交。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} when they have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining. They also gain an additional +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship after using any Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on a target with less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
These two sets of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} stack with each other but do not stack with themselves (the Officer can only have up to +20 Willpower and +20 Fellowship granted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} at any given time).

traits.locale_text:
当领袖当前{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于50%时，获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}。此外，当领袖对生命值低于50%的目标使用任何领袖{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}之后，还会额外获得+10意志与+10社交，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
这两项{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}可以互相叠加，但不能多次叠加。也就是说，此项{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}最多只能为领袖+20意志与+20社交。

languages.text:
El oficial gana +10 de Voluntad y +10 de Empatía cuando le queda menos del 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}. También gana +10 de Voluntad y +10 de Empatía adicionales durante 1 asalto tras usar cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de oficial en un objetivo con menos del 50 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}.
Estos conjuntos de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} se acumulan entre ellos, pero no consigo mismos (el oficial solo puede obtener un máximo de +20 de Voluntad y +20 de Empatía de este {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g}).
languages.original_text:
The Officer gains +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship when they have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining. They also gain an additional +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship after using any Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on a target with less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for 1 round.
These two sets of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} stack with each other but do not stack with themselves (the Officer can only have up to +20 Willpower and +20 Fellowship granted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} at any given time).

traits.locale_text:
El oficial gana +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} cuando le queda menos del 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}. También gana +10 de Voluntad y +10 de Empatía adicionales durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} tras usar cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de oficial en un objetivo con menos del 50 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}.
Estos conjuntos de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} se acumulan entre ellos, pero no consigo mismos (el oficial solo puede obtener un máximo de +20 de Voluntad y +20 de Empatía de este {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g}).

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}体力が最大値{/g}の50%未満になると、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}に+10、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}に+10の効果が得られる。また、いずれかのオフィサー{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使うと、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が最大値の50%未満のターゲットは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、意志力に+10、連帯に+10の効果を得る。
これらふたつの{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}セットはスタックするが、重ねがけはされない(この{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}によって、オフィサーはいつでも意志力に最大+20、連帯に最大+20の効果を得る)。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} when they have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining. They also gain an additional +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship after using any Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on a target with less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
These two sets of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} stack with each other but do not stack with themselves (the Officer can only have up to +20 Willpower and +20 Fellowship granted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} at any given time).

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が最大値の50%未満になると、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}に+10、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}友情{/g}に+10の効果が得られる。また、いずれかのリーダー{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使うと、体力が最大値の50%未満のターゲットは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、意志力に+10、友情に+10の効果を得る。
これらふたつの{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}セットはスタックするが、重ねがけはされない(この{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}によって、リーダーはいつでも意志力に最大+20、友情に最大+20の効果を得る)。

languages.text:
Офицер получает +10 к Воле и +10 к Общительности, когда у него остается меньше 50% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. Также он получает +10 к Воле и +10 к Общительности на 1 раунд после применения любой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} своего архетипа к цели, у которой осталось меньше 50% здоровья.
Эти наборы {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусов{/g} суммируются друг с другом, но не сами с собой (одновременно от этого {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}таланта{/g} офицер может получить +20 к Воле и +20 к Общительности).
languages.original_text:
The Officer gains +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship when they have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining. They also gain an additional +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship after using any Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on a target with less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for 1 round.
These two sets of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} stack with each other but do not stack with themselves (the Officer can only have up to +20 Willpower and +20 Fellowship granted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} at any given time).

traits.locale_text:
Лидер получает +10 к Воле и +10 к Общительности, когда у него остается меньше 50% от максимального запаса здоровья. Также он получает +10 к Воле и +10 к Общительности на 1 раунд после применения любой способности своей доктрины к цели, у которой осталось меньше 50% здоровья.
Эти наборы бонусов суммируются друг с другом, но не сами с собой (одновременно от этого таланта лидер может получить +20 к Воле и +20 к Общительности).

Лидер получает +10 к Воле и +10 к Общительности, когда у него остается меньше 50% от максимального запаса здоровья. Также он получает +10 к Воле и +10 к Общительности на 1 раунд после применения любой способности своей доктрины к цели, у которой осталось меньше 50% здоровья.
Эти наборы бонусов суммируются друг с другом, но не сами с собой (одновременно от этого таланта лидер может получить +20 к Воле и +20 к Общительности).

languages.text:
Der Offizier erhält +10 Willenskraft und +10 Gefolgschaft, wenn er weniger als 50 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} hat. Darüber hinaus erlangt er für 1 Runde weitere +10 Willenskraft und +10 Gefolgschaft, nachdem er eine Offiziers-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} auf ein Ziel angewendet hat, das weniger als 50 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} hat.
Diese beiden {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g}-Sets stapeln sich miteinander, aber nicht mit sich selbst (der Offizier kann niemals mehr als +20 Willenskraft und +20 Gefolgschaft durch dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} haben).
languages.original_text:
The Officer gains +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship when they have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining. They also gain an additional +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship after using any Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on a target with less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for 1 round.
These two sets of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} stack with each other but do not stack with themselves (the Officer can only have up to +20 Willpower and +20 Fellowship granted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} at any given time).

traits.locale_text:
Der Offizier erlangt +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}, wenn er weniger als 50 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} übrig hat. Darüber hinaus erlangt er für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} weitere +10 Willenskraft und +10 Gefolgschaft, nachdem er eine Offiziers-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} auf ein Ziel angewendet hat, das weniger als 50 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} übrig hat.
Diese beiden {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g}-Sets stapeln sich miteinander, aber nicht mit sich selbst (der Offizier kann niemals mehr als +20 Willenskraft und +20 Gefolgschaft durch dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} haben).

languages.text:
L'officier obtient +10 de Volonté et +10 de Sociabilité lorsqu'il lui reste moins de 50 % de sa réserve {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum de blessures{/g}. Pendant 1 round, il bénéficie également de +10 de Volonté et +10 de Sociabilité en plus après l'utilisation d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'officier sur une cible à laquelle il reste moins de 50 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}.
Ces deux séries de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} sont cumulables l'une avec l'autre, mais pas avec elles-mêmes (ce {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} ne peut conférer à l'officier qu'un maximum de +20 de Volonté et +20 de Sociabilité à la fois).
languages.original_text:
The Officer gains +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship when they have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining. They also gain an additional +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship after using any Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on a target with less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for 1 round.
These two sets of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} stack with each other but do not stack with themselves (the Officer can only have up to +20 Willpower and +20 Fellowship granted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} at any given time).

traits.locale_text:
Le Leader obtient +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} et +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fraternité{/g} lorsqu'il lui reste moins de 50 % de sa réserve maximum de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il bénéficie également de +10 de Volonté et +10 de Fraternité en plus après l'utilisation d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de Leader sur une cible à laquelle il reste moins de 50 % de sa réserve de blessures.
Ces deux séries de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} sont cumulables l'une avec l'autre mais pas avec elles-mêmes (ce {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} ne peut conférer au Leader qu'un maximum de +20 de Volonté et +20 de Fraternité à la fois).

languages.text:
Subay, sağlığı {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %50'sinin altına inmişse +10 İrade ve +10 Sosyallik kazanır. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı %50'nin altında olan bir hedef üzerinde herhangi bir Subay {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} kullanırsa ilave +10 İrade ve +10 Sosyallik kazanır.
Bu iki {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} seti, üst üste birikse de aynı setler üst üste birikmez (bu {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}beceri{/g}, Subay'a aynı anda en fazla +20 İrade ve +20 Sosyallik kazandırabilir).
languages.original_text:
The Officer gains +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship when they have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining. They also gain an additional +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship after using any Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on a target with less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for 1 round.
These two sets of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} stack with each other but do not stack with themselves (the Officer can only have up to +20 Willpower and +20 Fellowship granted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} at any given time).
